content: this pattern is knitted flat and then sewn around a styrofoam wreath mine was 18 in diameter and 2 1/8 thick you could easily adjust the pattern to fit your foam or even sew and stuff it with polyfill supplies ● super bulky yarn i used about 110 yards of yarn bee cozy occasion ● knitting needles size 8mm and 9mm ● cable needles i just used my 9mm needles ● 18 styrofoam wreath ● saftey pins about 50 ● tapestry needle tip to ensure that my sides matched up when i sewed it together i placed a safety pin through the first and last stitches of each 8th round then joined the matching pins together before sewing
